title: Fatayer (Lebanese spinach pie)
ingredients: ['For the pastry dough', '1 teaspoon active dried yeast', '150ml water', '250g plain flour', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 pinch salt', 'For the filling', '400g fresh spinach', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '50ml olive oil', '150g goats cheese', '1 teaspoon sumac', 'salt and pepper', '1 onion, minced', 'oil for frying']
